SceneDescription.name: Art Gallery - 2F
SceneDescription.description:
Assassin: [As much as I would also love for that thing to be burned, I really can't let her do that...]
Assassin: "You know that's acrylic, right?"
Maid: "So what? What's that supposed to mean?"
Assassin: "You're gonna be here a while if you want to burn that. You're better off burning the painting over the-I MEAN DOWNSTAIRS in the Servant's Quarters, which totally has paintings!"
Maid: "That's a really good idea, Mr. Tall Scary Person! I'll go do that!"
You take the opportunity to surreptitiously relieve the maid of the ligher as she marches out the door.

action.description: Assassin: [I'd better keep this. I'd rather not deal with ANOTHER pyromaniac.]
